name: VoM - Telekinesis Test TWO
description:
Prototype scene used to test out and gather feedback on the Telekinesis ability.

GAMEPAD ONLY. There is currently no keyboard support for this.

CONTROLS------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Normal Attack - West Button (X on Xbox controller)

Aim - hold Right Shoulder button, while using the Right Analog stick to freely aim around

Telekinesis - While aiming, hold Left Trigger to activate Telekinesis. 

Move Enemies with Telekinesis - Use Right Analog stick to move enemies while holding Telekinesis button

NEW: Telekinesis "Burst" - Press Right Trigger to get a burst of speed while using Telekinesis.

NEW: Aim Lock: Press the Right Analog Stick button (while aiming towards an enemy) to snap into target locking mode. Use the Right Analog Stick to switch targets.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The room is a little more packed with things this time. Try out the ability on multiple objects
